org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core

Class CloudSim

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.CloudSim
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulation

    public class CloudSim
extends Object
implements Simulation
    The main class of the simulation API, that manages Cloud Computing simulations providing all methods to start, pause and stop them. It sends and processes all discrete events during the simulation time.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov, Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

    • Field Summary

      The deferred event queue.
      protected FutureQueue future
      The future event queue.

        NULL, SIM_ANY, SIM_NONE

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudSim(int numUser)
      Creates a CloudSim simulation using a default calendar and that does not track events.

      Creates a CloudSim simulation with the given parameters and using a default Calendar.

      Creates a CloudSim simulation with the given parameters and that does not track events.

      Deprecated. 
      Use the other available constructors with less parameters and set the remaining ones using the respective setters. This constructor will be removed in future versions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CloudSim

        public CloudSim(int numUser)
        Creates a CloudSim simulation using a default calendar and that does not track events.

        Inside this method, it will create the following CloudSim entities:

        • CloudInformationService.
        • CloudCloudSimShutdown

        Parameters:
        numUser - the number of DatacenterBroker created. This parameters indicates that CloudCloudSimShutdown first waits for all user entities's END_OF_SIMULATION signal before issuing terminate signal to other entities
        See Also:
        CloudCloudSimShutdown, CloudInformationService
        Precondition:
        numUser >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • CloudSim

        public CloudSim(int numUsers,
                Calendar cal,
                boolean traceFlag)
         throws RuntimeException
        Creates a CloudSim simulation with the given parameters.

        Inside this method, it will create the following CloudSim entities:

        • CloudInformationService.
        • CloudCloudSimShutdown

        Parameters:
        numUsers - the number of DatacenterBroker created. This parameters indicates that CloudCloudSimShutdown first waits for all user entities's END_OF_SIMULATION signal before issuing terminate signal to other entities
        cal - starting time for this simulation. If it is null, then the time will be taken from Calendar.getInstance()
        traceFlag - true if CloudSim trace need to be written
        Throws:
        RuntimeException
        See Also:
        CloudCloudSimShutdown, CloudInformationService
        Precondition:
        numUsers >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • CloudSim

        public CloudSim(int numUsers,
                boolean traceFlag)
         throws RuntimeException
        Creates a CloudSim simulation with the given parameters and using a default Calendar.

        Inside this method, it will create the following CloudSim entities:

        • CloudInformationService.
        • CloudCloudSimShutdown

        Parameters:
        numUsers - the number of DatacenterBroker created. This parameters indicates that CloudCloudSimShutdown first waits for all user entities's END_OF_SIMULATION signal before issuing terminate signal to other entities
        traceFlag - true if CloudSim trace need to be written
        Throws:
        RuntimeException
        See Also:
        CloudCloudSimShutdown, CloudInformationService
        Precondition:
        numUsers >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • CloudSim

        public CloudSim(int numUser,
                Calendar cal)
        Creates a CloudSim simulation with the given parameters and that does not track events.

        Inside this method, it will create the following CloudSim entities:

        • CloudInformationService.
        • CloudCloudSimShutdown

        Parameters:
        numUser - the number of DatacenterBroker created. This parameters indicates that CloudCloudSimShutdown first waits for all user entities's END_OF_SIMULATION signal before issuing terminate signal to other entities
        cal - starting time for this simulation. If it is null, then the time will be taken from Calendar.getInstance()
        See Also:
        CloudCloudSimShutdown, CloudInformationService
        Precondition:
        numUser >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • CloudSim

        @Deprecated
public CloudSim(int numUser,
                            Calendar cal,
                            boolean traceFlag,
                            double periodBetweenEvents)
                     throws RuntimeException
        Deprecated. Use the other available constructors with less parameters and set the remaining ones using the respective setters. This constructor will be removed in future versions.
        Creates a CloudSim simulation with the given parameters.

        Inside this method, it will create the following CloudSim entities:

        • CloudInformationService.
        • CloudCloudSimShutdown

        Parameters:
        numUser - the number of DatacenterBroker created. This parameters indicates that CloudCloudSimShutdown first waits for all user entities's END_OF_SIMULATION signal before issuing terminate signal to other entities
        cal - starting time for this simulation. If it is null, then the time will be taken from Calendar.getInstance()
        traceFlag - true if CloudSim trace need to be written
        periodBetweenEvents - - the minimal period between events. Events within shorter periods after the last event are discarded.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException
        See Also:
        CloudInformationService
        Precondition:
        numUser >= 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public double start()
             throws RuntimeException
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Starts the execution of CloudSim simulation. It waits for complete execution of all entities, i.e. until all entities threads reach non-RUNNABLE state or there are no more events in the future event queue.

        Note: This method should be called after all the entities have been setup and added.

        Specified by:
        start in interface Simulation
        Returns:
        the last clock time
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - when creating this entity before initialising CloudSim package or this entity name is null or empty.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws RuntimeException
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Stops Cloud Simulation (based on Simulation.runStop()). This should be only called if any of the user defined entities explicitly want to terminate simulation during execution.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Simulation
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - This happens when creating this entity before initialising CloudSim package or this entity name is null or empty
        See Also:
        #CloudSim(int, Calendar, boolean), Simulation.runStop()

      • terminate

        public boolean terminate()
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        This method is called if one wants to terminate the simulation.
        Specified by:
        terminate in interface Simulation
        Returns:
        true, if successful; false otherwise.

      • wait

        public void wait(int src,
                 Predicate p)
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Sets an entity's state to be waiting. The predicate used to wait for an event is now passed to Sim_system. Only events that satisfy the predicate will be passed to the entity. This is done to avoid unnecessary context switches.
        Specified by:
        wait in interface Simulation
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        p - the p
